釜山.definition: Busan Metropolitan City in South Gyeongsang Province 慶尚南道|庆尚南道[Qing4 shang4 nan2 dao4], South Korea

釜山市.definition: Busan Metropolitan City in South Gyeongsang Province 慶尚南道|庆尚南道[Qing4 shang4 nan2 dao4], South Korea

釜山廣域市.definition: Busan Metropolitan City in South Gyeongsang Province 慶尚南道|庆尚南道[Qing4 shang4 nan2 dao4], South Korea

釜底抽薪.definition: to take drastic measures to deal with a situation; to pull the carpet from under sb

釜底游魚.definition: a fish at the bottom of the pot (idiom); in a desperate situation
